title: AlmaLinux: Deploy a DHCP Server for Your Internal Network
author: Jack Wallen
description: By deploying a DHCP server to run your internal network on a separate Linux server, you are in control of the updates and even the security of the device.
cntitle: AlmaLinux：为您的内部网络部署 DHCP 服务器
cndescription: 通过将 DHCP 服务器部署到单独的 Linux 服务器上以运行您的内部网络，您可以控制更新甚至设备的安全性。
